subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Azinger, the U.S. captain, named Steve Stricker, Hunter Mahan, J.B. Holmes and Chad Campbell to join the eight automatic qualifiers on the team.
snippet: Paul Azinger, the U.S. captain, named Steve Stricker, Hunter Mahan, J.B. Holmes and Chad Campbell to join the eight automatic qualifiers on the team.
